data.scheme_name: Bihar IT (Information Technology) Policy 2024 - Employment Generation Subsidy - Female -All Categories - Existing
data.benefits:
1. Scheme provides 100% reimbursement on account of employer's contribution towards EPF and ESI subject to max. limit of Rs.0.05 lakh per employee per month for a period of 5 years. 
  2. Additional incentive of 5% to women owned enterprises.
data.eligibility: All existing IT/ITes/ESDM units are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. IT/ITeS/ESDM units shall have to ensure that minimum 60% of employees must be stationed in Bihar. All incentive shall be applicable after commercial production and till max. period of 5 years. 
  2. Units must have GST registration of Bihar.
  3. Reimbursement to the applicant will be done on submission of proof of payment made by the applicant to the authorities. 
  4. Individual women entrepreneur must have minimum 51% of shareholding in IT/ITeS/ESDM units and hold director position in the units.
data.beneficiaries: All existing IT/ITes/ESDM units are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. IT/ITeS/ESDM units shall have to ensure that minimum 60% of employees must be stationed in Bihar. 
  2. All incentive shall be applicable after commercial production and till max. period of 5 years. 
  3. Units must have GST registration of Bihar 
  4. Reimbursement to the applicant will be done on submission of proof of payment made by the applicant to the authorities. 
  5. Individual women entrepreneur must have minimum 51% of shareholding in IT/ITeS/ESDM units and hold director position in the units.
data.context: Bihar IT Policy 2024 introduced to develop the IT/ ITeS and ESDM industry of the State for inclusive socio- economic growth and gainful employment generation, and to emerge as the next investment destination for IT/ ITeS companies in the country, while offering an enabling environment for industrial investments, stable policies and transparent governance.
data.objective: The main objective of this scheme is to build a strong eco-system for nurturing innovation in the State and empower them to grow across domains in the IT/ ITeS and ESDM sector.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides 100% reimbursement on account of employer's contribution towards EPF and ESI subject to max. limit of Rs.0.05 lakh per employee per month for a period of 5 years. 
  2. Additional incentive of 5% to women owned enterprises.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through http://investit.bihar.gov.in/InterestForm
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the Employment generation reimbursement for a period of 5 years.
data.additional_info:
1. Minimum turnover per employee per annum: IT units - ₹20 lakh, ESDM units - ₹50 lakh. 
  2. To qualify for benefits, the unit must generate at least 25 direct jobs, with 50% of employees being permanent Bihar residents and 60% stationed in Bihar. 
  3. Additional 5% incentives for SC/ST/BC/EBC/Women/Divyangjan/War widows/Acid attack survivors/Third gender entrepreneurs holding 51% shareholding and a Director or equivalent position. 
  4. Additional 10% incentives for units established outside Patna and Danapur Municipal areas. 
  5. Benefits under this policy cannot be combined with other state schemes for the same investment; dovetailing with central schemes is permitted.
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate
GST Registration Certificate
Sel-declaration by organization
Biometric records copy of attendence of employees
Copy of Payments
Project Report
Registered Lease Deed
Energy bill 
Applications
KYC Documents
Incorporation Certificate
Letter of Authorization, 
Affidavit
First Sale Bill/Invoice/ Certificate from Labor department (Expansion)
Degree Certificate of all employees
PF/ESI Statement 8: Pay slip
Domicile certificate for employees from Bihar
Unit self-declaration and maintain Aadhar Card,
 Rent Agreement for Stationed Emolovee
Employee Details Certificate duly verified by Competent Authority 
Copies of Statutory returns for amount of contribution of EPF and ESI,
Applicable category Certificate of the Promotor, Directors, who is having stake holdino of 51% or more
Cancelled cheque of the bank account of the IT/ITeS/ESDM Entity
Other documents as required
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 2nd and 5th floor , Technology Bhawan, Bailey Road , Patna 800015 (Bihar)
Ph. No.: +91-612-2547315
Email ID: invest.it@bihar.gov.in
data.beneficiary: IT/ITeS Industry - Proprietorship, Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership, Private Limited Company, Public Company - Bihar - All MSMEs and Non-MSMEs
